name: 11-banme no Neko wa Nene
creator: Harikamo
summary:
In the land of the cat people, it is a serious crime for outsiders to enter without permission. However, Nene, a mouse-girl, has managed to sneak into the country with a mysterious goal. In the meantime, Nene finds work at the Rai Rai Teahouse. Working alongside beautiful cat-girls, she struggles to learn how to "be a cat" from her senpais.

(Source: Natalie, translated)

name: 2.5 Jigen no Ririsa
creator: Yuu Hashimoto
summary:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)

name: 7-Nin no Nemuri Hime
creator: Fiok Lee
summary: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?

name: 7-dai Tatarimasu node Hayaku Kekkon Shitekudasai!
creator: Inokuma Shinobu
summary:
**A chaotic and ecchi romantic comedy about a goddess out to curse a family and the unfortunate guy who falls for her!**

Kuro, a black cat, is a god of fortune down on her luck. She’s turned into a “vengeful god” against her will, and the only way to return to her former status is to curse seven generations of the Nishikori bloodline. She’s close to being free, but to get there, she needs to make sure the seventh generation actually gets born. That means finding a match for Nishikori Kotaro…which is harder than you might think, because Kotaro is tragically unpopular. Not only that, he insists that the only woman he wants…is cat-eared Kuro herself!

*Source: Seven Seas Entertainment, Vol. 1*

name: Akatsuki no Yona
creator: Kusanagi Mizuho
summary:
Yona is the sole princess of the Kingdom of Kouka, living a luxurious and carefree life as a princess should. She has it all: the finest clothes and cosmetics, the most divine sweets, a loving emperor as a father, and the hottest cousin crush, Soo-won, any girl could ever hope to have. Now, if only her bodyguard, Son Hak, weren't so annoying towards her, and if her hair weren't so red...

But her nearly perfect world quickly shatters as the man she loves, Soo-won, murders her father and the path to his ascension to the throne is assured. Son Hak escapes with Yona, and they lead a life on the run from that point on.
___
Yona reels from the shock of witnessing a loved one's murder and having to fight for her life. With Hak's help, she flees the palace and struggles to survive while evading her enemy's forces. But where will this displaced princess go when all the paths before her are uncertain?

name: Akuma no Memumemu-chan
creator: Yotsuya Keitarou
summary: A comedy about a crybaby devil who is really not suited for the position and its duties.

name: Akuyaku Reijou Route ga Nai Nante, Dare ga Itta no?
creator: Puni-Chan
summary:
I reincarnated into the world of an otome game as the villainess, "Ophelia". I thought I'd be able to enjoy a peaceful school life, but to my dismay, I found myself subjected to constant harassment at the hands of the wicked, vindictive heroine; and to top it all off, I'm plunging headlong into the dreaded Bad Ending — hold up, as if I'd meekly submit to such a fate! If that's how it’s going to be, I'll tap into the top secret "cheats" known only to those who've played the game and carve out the "Villainess Route" of my fantasies!! But for some unfathomable reason, the capture targets seem to be doting on me far more aggressively than in the original story...?  

---
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0411fu/)

name: Amayo no Tsuki
creator: Kuzushiro
summary: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl's name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.

name: Bakushin Ojou-sama Dou!
creator: Shigatsu Shizuki
summary: Sakuraba Sakurako is at the entrance ceremony of Neo Mogitori Academy, a school for training young ladies. She tries to enter the school with a dog as her companion, but the teacher stops her and she ends up fighting the dog. Sakurako narrowly wins the battle and meets the boys and girls who will work hard together to become the ultimate ojou-sama.

name: Being Targeted by Hyena-chan
creator: Zyugoya
summary: I found out that my long-distance girlfriend had gotten a new older boyfriend from the city and while I was in the grip of despair, a girl named Haibara Enako, more affectionately called "Hyena-chan" suddenly appeared before me and confessed, "I don't have a boyfriend and I'm free right now."

name: Blade Of No Return
creator: Gooni先輩
summary: Kurogane Renji, a 28-year-old towering hitman burdened by his past, is transported into another world after a fateful encounter with a goddess who tests both his skill and pride. Cast into a kingdom that mocks his worth, he quickly learns survival means cutting down not only his enemies but even those summoned beside him. In a world where betrayal brews and power decides fate, Renji’s blade knows only one path: forward, with no return.

name: Blue Lock
creator: Muneyuki Kaneshiro
summary: A radical training program to create the best striker in Japan...

name: Bokura no Complex
creator: Tonogaya Miyuki
summary: When what you think is an advantage is actually a burden to someone else.

name: Boruto - Two Blue Vortex
creator: Kishimoto Masashi
summary:
With everyone's memories having been altered, Boruto finds himself being hunted by his own village. After escaping with Sasuke, what future awaits Boruto...?

(Source: MangaPlus)
___
**Links:**
- [Viz - Alternative Official English](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/boruto-two-blue-vortex)

name: Bungo Stray Dogs Gaiden - Ayatsuji Yukito VS. Kyougoku Natsuhiko
creator: Asagiri Kafka
summary: Known for his biting wit and rapid-fire brain cells, Yukito Ayatsuji is a detective and top-ranked skill user who possesses the ability to expose any crime. When a request to investigate a puzzling murder incident hits his desk, Ayatsuji must team up with Mizuki Tsujimura, a spunky agent sent from the Special Division, to tackle the case. Can the unlikely duo get to the bottom of this mystery?!

name: Chainsaw Man
creator: Fujimoto Tatsuki
summary:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!

name: Cheolhyeolgeomga Sanyanggaeui Hoegwi
creator: Seol Arang
summary:
Raised to kill like a pack of loyal hounds, the Baskerville children took countless lives as a band of fearsome assassins.

Despite being the shunned illegitimate son of the brood, Vikir served his family faithfully, only to meet his untimely demise at his father’s hands. But when he is inexplicably reborn with a second chance at life, Vikir, armed with the memories and knowledge of his past, swears to rise above the pack and take his revenge.

This time, he's ready to bite the hand that feeds.

name: Cheonmanbaeuui Ttari Doeeotda
creator: 마로
summary: Fifth-grader Lumin lost her mother to cancer and was abandoned by her father. She learns the fact that her biological father is the popular actor Jeong Hajin, but he rejects her. Lumin, who wants to be truly loved by her father, tries to become a child actress and prove her own abilities.

name: Chiikawa: Nanka Chiisakute Kawaii Yatsu (Webcomic Pages)
creator: Nagano
summary: Follow the adventures of Chiikawa the innocent cute creature, Hachiware the kind cat, and Usagi the chaotic rabbit as they work their hardest to survive in a world filled with dangerous monsters, mysterious armored taskmasters, and fantastical phenomena at every turn!

name: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata ~Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin~
creator: Kurokata
summary: Usato, an ordinary high schooler, happens to run into two fellow students after school one rainy day. Suddenly, all three of them are engulfed in a magic circle and transported to a fantasy world. There's just one tiny problem — Usato is simply dragged along by accident!  On top of that, Usato learns that he is capable of using healing magic — an incredibly rare affinity in this new world. Now Usato must spend his days with the rescue team thugs, struggling through their hellish training regimen — learning the wrong way to use healing magic.

name: Chou Nankan Dungeon de 10-mannen Shugyou shita Kekka, Sekai Saikyou ni ~Saijaku Munou no Gekokujou~
creator: Riki Sui (力水)
summary:
The Most Incompetent Person in the World.

Kai Heinemann received this gift at the age of 13. The effects of the gift resulted in Kai's significantly reduced physical abilities, and he became despised and bullied in the gifted supremacy of Lamour. Kai is forced to leave his home and is attacked on his way to the royal capital, and while desperately running away, he wanders into a dungeon. In the dungeon, he had to clear the "Trial of the Gods" to get out, and the time did not progress. Kai, feeling like he was going to die, spent 100,000 years clearing the dungeon. In the process of clearing the trial of the gods, Kai becomes the most powerful being in the world, gaining unique and strong friends along the way.

name: Chronicles of the Lazy Sovereign
creator: Biga (비가)
summary:
Wi Yeonho, the Radiant Martial Sovereign, is the great martial artist who ended the world's calamity.  

He was a nobleman, a paragon, and a peerless hero...  

"That man? He was a complete and utter scoundrel."

A truth too shocking for the world to know.   The real face of history's greatest hero is about to be exposed!

name: Cinderella's Pocket-Sized Protector
creator: SKELL
summary:
After marrying the prince, Cinderella’s “happily ever after” ends when he falls for another woman and proposes to her. A small, powerless field mouse, who dearly loves Cinderella, wishes she could smile again. Mysteriously, the mouse dies and wakes up in the past, when Cinderella was still mistreated by her stepfamily. Then comes a twist: the mouse isn’t ordinary, but a noble beastman from the prestigious Field Mouse clan. With her true identity revealed, she decides to run away with Cinderella — before the prince and his glass slipper ever show up.

---
Cinderella married the prince. But she never thought that her vow of eternal love would end in just 10 years. The prince fell in love with a certain young lady at first sight, made her his mistress, and even proposed to her. 'Damn!' But she couldn't do anything for Cinderella, who was withering away day by day. Because I was, "Click!" a mouse! And the smallest of all mice, the lowest in the hierarchy, a field mouse. 'Fairy grandmother. I'm just a disgusting mouse. Cinderella was the one who embraced me. What I wish for is... '... I wish Cinderella could smile again.' I thought I died. When I woke up again, I was back in time. Back to Cinderella's childhood when she was being abused by her stepmother and older sisters. 

"I came here on the request of the Ratson family."

But I wasn't really an ordinary mouse, but a beastkin of the field mouse family? My family was desperately looking for me? Then, Cinderella, run away with me! Prince, I'll take her away before you come looking for her with that glass slipper!

name: Code Geass: Lelouch The Private Home Tutor
creator: Urushidama
summary:
Why has Lelouch become C.C.’s tutor?!  
  
Lelouch and Nunnally were living in peace, but then one day a spoiled rich girl with absolutely no common sense named C.C. moved in next door. At the request of his mother, Marianne, Lelouch has taken on the task of ensuring her education – and now he’s made a contract with C.C. to be her personal tutor…?!   
  
A high school AU comedy begins!

name: Colori Colore Creare
creator: Amano Kozue
summary: The town of Onobori is located on an island and is protected by a noren (a traditional Japanese curtain). Aka is a naive girl living alone with her grandfather who runs a coffee shop in a quaint windmill hut. An encounter with a giant black cat opens the curtain on a story of creating the colors of the future by weaving together the colorful splendor that is scattered throughout daily life!

name: Daiakutou Shonen
creator: Fujichika Koume
summary:
**You better prepare yourself, damn world.**

Everything in this world is absurd. The heroes who pretend to fight with grace, the minor villains who can only commit petty crimes, his classmates who always hang out in groups… and his own weak and miserable self.

―And so the boy yearns to change everything, not only himself but also the world—for he will become the lone, the noble, the ultimate "Great Villain"!

A new villain story drawn by Fujichika Koume, author of *"The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses"* !

name: Daily Chaldea
creator: Rednal
summary:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

name: Doom Satsujin Keisatsukan no Danzairoku
creator: Koga Kei
summary:
Dan Hiroki, the Chief of the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department's 1st Investigation Division. An elite among elites with a brilliant career, his hidden face is that of a serial killer who enacts vigilante justice upon sinful villains.

This is the second official spin-off of "Trace: Reminiscences of a Forensic Scientist." The devil's pleasurable record of condemnation, preying on the wicked, begins.

(Source: Comic Zenon, translated)

name: Dore dake Doryoku Shite mo Mannen Level 0 no Ore wa Tsuihou Sareta ~Shin no Teki to Yobareta Shounen wa, Shachiku Megami to Deatte Saikyou no Chikara wo Te ni Ireru~
creator: Hasuike Tarou
summary: No matter how hard he tries, adventurer Tinto he can't raise his level, and is called [God's Enemy]. When he was finally expelled from the party, the goddess Esther appeared to him - and got down on her knees. To his surprise, Tinto was still at level 0 because of her mistake!

name: Drug Store Tenin Sacchan no Nichijou
creator: Izumi Rei
summary: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.

name: Dà lǎo nǐ tóu yòu diàole
creator: Lily Club (橘姬社)
summary:
Everyone knows slaying monsters make you level up.
But me? I AM the monster...

I'm the only zombie on Earth who can survive having my head fall off. In order to stay alive, I've hidden my identity, laid low, and pretended to be just another corpse.

Also... I couldn't stop worrying about my frail ex-girlfriend—so I decided to protect her from the shadows.

But, who knew she’d turn into a badass zombie-slayer? And now she’s found me?!

I flee, she hunts. Our fates are like an entangled mess.

And KA-BOOM! The whole world is doomed!

Alright then, no more hiding.

The truth is... I'm the vaccine.

name: Egao no Taenai Shokuba desu.
creator: Kuzushiro
summary: New shoujo manga artist Nana Futami works hard every day while being supported by Kaede Satou, her female editor who is older than her, and Mizuki Hazama, her assistant. According to the girl herself, she sometimes drums up intense daydream delusions of occupational illness!

name: Essei Manga Matome ~30-nen Akiramezu ni Mangaka ni Natta Nīto no Ohanashi~
creator: Yamase Chika
summary: This is an essay-style manga about a person named Yamase Chika and their journey to becoming a manga artist. She is known as the author of The Jeweler’s Maid.

name: Everyone Loves Her
creator: Sriracha
summary: With the sudden acquisition of the ability, Kang Mina’s life is completely turned upside down. Now, she stands at a crossroads where a single choice can lead to irreversible consequences. Amidst anger, confusion, and a suppressed sense of justice, Mina struggles with how to use her newfound power as she embarks on a new journey. Where will her power take her?

name: Fly Over the Sea
creator: 聚能画工作室
summary:
Ji Chi, the young master of a gang, was betrayed and murdered by his fiancé. He was then transmigrated 30 years in the past into the body of a 19-year-old. Here, the Alpha was saved by a kindhearted and gentle Beta during a time of desperation. However, the person who he thought was an angelic savior, had the exact same face as the murderer who killed him in his previous life...

Merciless, younger, bad boy Alpha X Intelligent, soft boy, older, doctor Beta

name: For Each Retweet, Two Straight Girls Who Don't Get Along Will Kiss for One Second
creator: Fukuroumori
summary: Two straight girls who don't get along will kiss 1 second for every 1 retweet

name: For the Shattered Things
creator: Go Hana
summary:
Choi Yeon was abandoned by her friends and family. Now a university student, she has started working as a private tutor for a son of a rich family in Seongbuk-dong to hide her poverty. By chance, while working there she met Ji Shinhyuk, the older brother of her student.

Shinhyuk, the real owner of the house, completely ignored Yeon as if she was a mere object. But one day, he began to call on Yeon to perform menial errands. Some days, he would be crude; others, disrespectful. He would provoke Yeon with his indecipherable expression. Despite that, Yeon began to foster a growing attraction toward Shinhyuk, and hoped she would eventually catch his eye...

---
**Official Raws**
[Ridibooks R15 ver.](https://ridibooks.com/books/3093001461)
[Ridibooks R19 ver.](https://ridibooks.com/books/3093001173)

name: GOLDEN MAN
creator: Petos
summary:
The city of freedom, Neo York, is targeted by villains day and night, but it's also home to the strongest hero, Golden Man!!! But one night, during a rescue operation at a fire at an abandoned factory, Golden Man suddenly disappears. Left in his place, a single amnesiac young man with the Golden Man suit in his hands... Who on Earth is he?
___
- **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550668106005965940)
- [Official X](https://x.com/goldenman_comic)

name: Gachi Koi Maou-sama
creator: Moriya Haru
summary: A hero undertakes the task of defeating the Demon Lord for the sake of world peace. When he arrives at the Demon Lord's castle, he is greeted by the Demon Lord with a marriage certificate in her hand! The hero is bewildered by the Demon Lord's strong appeal to marry him, but...? A love comedy about a die-hard-fan Demon Lord and an overly prickly hero whose world is in danger of extinction!

name: Gakuen Tanmoshi
creator: Nigojuu
summary:
Finally, school life with Siesta!?

I did it!...But why? The detective is already...

A school romantic comedy that retains the everyday feel of the past, but also has some serious developments for those who have already read the original!!

name: Gal to Oyasan
creator: Yumeno Yuzu
summary:
Kotoha is a second-year high school student who puts all her energy into her part-time job, her studies, and her fashion sense. One day, when she returns to her boarding house, she finds out that Itsuki, a university student, is her temporary landlord!? Itsuki is great at cleaning, cooking, and being considerate, but Kotoha can't hide her excitement and confusion at his perfect landlord skills and his doting attitude!

A peaceful battle between an independent-minded honor student gyaru and a naturally charming university student begins.

(Source: Pixiv, translated)

name: Genkai Shakaijin-san o Sukueru no wa Kuso Deka Kanjou Stalker-chan Dakedeshita
creator: Chisako
summary:
“I can’t… I’m at my limit… I’m gonna die…”
Yamada Hana is drowning in a hellish working life, overloaded with nonstop tasks.
And the one who saved her from that nightmare was.

“I’m going to confine you”. A beautiful stranger who turns out to be a stalker!?

A luxurious mansion, extravagant meals, an open-air bath…
Her new life of confinement begins.
A heaven-like paradise where every desire is fulfilled!!

name: Geokjeong Maseyo, Habuidoen Sagi Gyeolhonimnida
creator: Dandi (단디)
summary:
As the legitimate heir to the imperial throne, Yullikian kuhn Rondenez is desperate to find a way to keep his usurping uncle from killing him next.
Frequenting the slums to make it seem like he's become a gambler, he crosses paths with Maddie, a notorious pickpocket who is willing to do anything for the right price, even kill.
That's when he comes up with a crazy plan.
Yullikian proposes to Maddie to get his uncle off his back, **but will this fake marriage lead to mad love or just madness?**

(Source: Tapas)

name: Guild no Zatsuyou-gakari ga Shin no Kuromaku deshita: Kakureta Sainou de Anyaku Musou
creator: Hishikawa Sakaku
summary: Branded a sinner and abandoned by the gods, Tennes—the unwanted child of a servant and a high noble—was cast out of his household. Now he lives as a humble handyman at a rural adventurer’s guild… or so it seems. In truth, Tennes is the mastermind behind a secret organization plotting to shatter the twisted rules that govern the world. Gifted with the unique skill 【Hermit】, granted only to those forsaken by divine prophecy, and supported by his most trusted allies, he begins a covert revolution. “Come, let’s change the world… but let’s make sure no one notices.” From the shadows, the strongest secret society〈God Eater〉sets its grand plan into motion!

name: Haha no Ai wa Mama Naranai!
creator: Homina Mia
summary: Kuzukake Shoutarou is a high school boy whose only family went missing while traveling. The ones who came to his rescue? The strongest stepmothers ever!? Housework and daily life taken care of down to the last detail!! An unpredictable, stepmother-filled harem romantic comedy begins!!

name: Haikei, Arishi Hi ni Saku Hanatachi e
creator: Igarashi Jun
summary: Kasumi, a serious girl who has just started at an all-girls school, discovers a letter tucked into an old book she found in the library. The letter's writer yearns to have a special relationship with another girl, like how it was described in the book… A romance about the the old-school "S" kind of girls-love.

name: Haimiya-senpai wa Kowakute Kawaii
creator: Kamiyama Sumu (神山すむ)
summary:
At my high school, Haimiya-senpai is feared by all and considered too scary. This is apparently due to her intimidating appearance and blunt way of speaking... and those sparkling piercings! The long, gray wolf-cut hair! Even her Kansai accent is intimidating!!!
But for some reason, this scary senpai treats me kindly...?
As "scary" turns into "cute," this scary (heart-pounding) senpai rom-com begins!

name: Hametsu no Oukoku
creator: yoruhashi
summary: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of Vengeance”.

name: Harapeko na Joushi no I wo Tsukamu Houhou
creator: Saeki-san
summary:
Having earned his boss' displeasure, Wilfried, who became a royal magician at a young age, was demoted and thrown into the weirdo's den, the division who did nothing but eat. He is assigned to be Ester's personal chef and his job entails feeding her and stopping her from running away from work.  
  
(Source : MU)

name: Harukaze Mound
creator: Gotou Tougo
summary: "We twins were born on the same day and share the same dream! And we've made a promise to each other!" Nobody's more passionate about baseball than the Kuzumi twins. Younger brother Aokaze and his golden right arm is a once in a generation talent! Older brother Nagiharu is a lefty bench warmer. These two have walked the same dream since birth, but when they meet a certain catcher, their destinies will begin to change. The creators of Phantom Seer bring you a serious baseball epic!

name: Hatori to Furuta no Hinichijou Sahanji
creator: Nonoue Daijirou
summary: Hatori is an average teen boy with no passions in life. One day he meets Furuta, a girl with a keen eye for the extraordinary that's hiding in the streets where they live... Small wonders can change the world in this (extra)ordinary coming of age series!

name: Hen'ai Café
creator: Arisaki Meika
summary: Somewhere there is a strange café called "Statice" where all sorts of even stranger people meet, each with a very special and different fetish. The owner, Mr. Sennichi, welcomes these special customers every day, and tries to help them solve their fetish related problems.

name: High School Boy
creator: Park Gee/Ji (박지)
summary:
Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?

name: Hitoribocchi no Isekai Kouryaku
creator: Goji Shoji
summary:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!

name: Hochiya-san wa Amariaru
creator: misekiss
summary: Norito Yonezawa, a low-energy high school student with little interest in reality, can't stop thinking about Hoya-san, a girl in his class. He doesn't care about the people around him...

name: Holiday Yasumi's Twitter Shorts
creator: Holiday Yasumi
summary:
Twitter manga posted occasionally by Holiday Yasumi.

Each post is self-contained, despite being numbered by chapter, so you can read them in any order you choose. Certain characters also make recurring appearances.

name: Honzuki no Gekokujou: Hannerōre no Kizoku-in Gonensei Ichi (Koishite Mitai O'hime-sama)
creator: Kazuki Miya

name: Houkago no Meikyuu Boukensha: Nippon to Isekai o Ikiki Dekiru You ni Natta Boku wa Level Up ni Isoshimimasu
creator: Hitsuji Gamei
summary:
High school student Kudo Akira is a man who can travel between Japan and another world called Do Merta. All he wants is a carefree, leisurely life in an isekai world!

From conquering labyrinths, exploring gourmet food and all sorts of other spicy "teehee" moments (and not the food kind)!! Trying to live the life he's always dreamed of! The story of a laid-back, infinite adventure begins!

name: I Am the Sorcerer King
creator: 데카스펠
summary:
Sunghoon Lee is nothing but a victim of a changing world, a powerless man in a land infested with beasts and magic. Monsters from another world invaded earth, and they brought with them a sickness that pushes Sunghoon’s mother into an endless sleep. To pay off her medical bills, he braved a dangerous job as bait used by powerful superhumans called Awakeners to hunt monsters. But when he found himself at death’s door, the image of his past life flashes through his mind. There, he found his truth: he is the reincarnation of the Sorcerer King!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%99%95%EC%9D%B4%EB%8B%A4/2337)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/22830)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000335)

- [Official Russian Translation](https://rumix.me/ia_korol_volshebnik)

name: I Became a Swordsmanship Instructor at the Academy
creator: Coldpig
summary:
The protagonist has possessed the body of Kang Shin-hyuk, a minor supporting character in a novel.

Deciding to leave the task of saving the world to the original heroes, Shin-hyuk plans to simply enjoy his new life. Unlike his past life, he now possesses a handsome face, a thick bank account, and the body of a B-Rank Hunter. His only goal: to live a popular, "insider" life without disrupting the original plot.

However, reality hits during a staff dinner when he faces discrimination for graduating from a non-Hunter school—a detail that never appeared in the original novel.

Disgusted by the two-faced nature of his fellow teachers, he decides he can't stay quiet if he wants to avoid being looked down upon. To secure the comfortable, popular life he desires, he begins to seek out "hidden pieces" of power. Even if it means altering the original story slightly, he decides he must become strong enough to protect himself.

name: I Like Your Pheromones
creator: Jinjiang Literature City (晋江文学城)
summary:
As a good-looking Beta with a good family background, Duan Jiayan has lived a smooth sailing life for more than ten years, until he met Lu Xingci in high school.

Lu Xingci’s family situation is better than his, he is taller than him and plays basketball better than him. Needless to say, his grades are a whole tier above Duan Jiayan’s. Even his friends can’t help but occasionally praise Lu Xingci.

Most importantly, every girl that Duan Jiayan has set his sights on, all admitted that they have liked Lu Xingci for a few years already.

Since then, Duan Jiayan has never thought well of Lu Xingci, till the day he received his new medical report. He is a late-blooming Omega, and because he became an Omega this late, it came with dire consequences. Now Alphas will feel the need to beat up other people whenever they come near Duan Jiayan. He himself is now allergic to every Alpha’s pheromone, except Lu Xingci’s.

name: I Only Want to Beat You
creator: Amadoji (아마도지)
summary: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?

name: I'm 27 She's 40
creator: Hadakii Murei
summary: A story about a 27-year-old salaryman, Nakano Shinpai, who has a 40-year-old girlfriend, Okuda Kanpeki, the CEO of an IT company.

name: I'm a Mom
creator: Leungho
summary: A world full of zombies, where my daughter lives. "Don't worry, dear.. Mommy will protect you, even if l become a monster...!"

name: Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni
creator: Tokonoma
summary:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).

name: Isekai Teni shitakedo, Ouritsu Gakuin de Jimuin Yattemasu
creator: Toraishi Sachiko

name: Itsuka Fukushuu Suru Sono Tame ni
creator: Kuga Tsuniya

name: Jeonjijeok Dokja Sijeom
creator: sing N song (싱숑)
summary: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.

name: Jipguseok Jeoldaeja
creator: Araman (아라만)
summary: Kill monsters, save your neighbors, and expand your domain, all from the comfort of your couch. When his city becomes infested with monsters, Jaehyeon discovers an ability that makes him the absolute master of his apartment building. But his ability comes with a catch -- he cannot leave his apartment. Now, he must arm his neighbors and lead them beyond their building to survive the post-apocalyptic world they find themselves in.

name: Kaji Daikou no Arubaito wo Hajimetara Gakuen Ichi no Bishoujo no Kazoku ni Kiniirarechaimashita.
creator: Shiohon
summary: During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house. From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school.

name: Kakkoii Onnanoko to 12-centi no Yakusoku
creator: Ziki Masaya
summary:
Tomoaki Kanba admired his boyish childhood friend, Ibuki Tachibana, and promised to become "more cool" than her. However, four years have passed, and Ibuki has grown up to be an even more handsome girl! Their relationship is as unchanged as a 12cm height difference that cannot be filled...?

The curtain rises on a pure love story about a cool girl who is sorely in love with a boy who wants to be cool!-

---

Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.

name: Kanojo wo CharaMake!
creator: Shisui Ao
summary: Body modification of a cosplaying childhood friend with efficient meals! Full breasts and a toned waist! Create the "ideal heroine" through nutritional balance and calorie management!

name: Karisome Chouhi no Pride
creator: Tiger Eye
summary:
Via, the fourth Princess, was impatient as the royal palace was busy fighting for succession. That’s because the lewd emperor implied that he wanted her to be his concubine. Via lived unobtrusively in a sickly setup, but even as she stays still, things just get worse. Therefore, she decided to offer a time-limited concubine contract to the next emperor, the first Prince Alex. 

With her fragile beauty on the outside, but her strength and intelligence on the inside, Via charms everyone around her and wields the Prince of the great power.

This is the story of the life of the unconventional Princess Via!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7466em)

name: Kawaii Koi wa Kikazaranai
creator: Ziki Masaya
summary: Amano Emi likes wearing cute clothes. One day, as she is arguing with a pick up artist who was harassing a girl, a drink is thrown at her. She is saved by a stranger...

name: Kigahayai Daigaku no Kouhai Kanojo
creator: Grande
summary: This is the story of a busty girlfriend who wears tights and is impatient to get cozy with her senior boyfriend whenever she wants.

name: Killing Bites
creator: Murata Shinya
summary: People have been created that are human-animal hybrids, and powerful businesses bet on the outcome of their duels. College student Nomoto Yuuya's casual acquaintances ask him to drive them around to pick up girls one day, which he soon finds out means by force. The girl they kidnap is an animal-human hybrid named Hitomi, who slaughters all of them except Yuuya. Hitomi is a honey badger, which has been called the most fearless of all animals. Now Hitomi is assigned to stay with Yuuya, for his protection! Killing Bites are underworld duels between human-animal hybrids. One beast who knows no fear will fight in this animalistic world full of fear and insanity.

name: Kinenbi Manga
creator: Pageratta
summary: A manga about celebrating all the different holidays a year has.

name: Kinnikuman II-Sei: Ultimate Chojin Tag Arc
creator: Yudetamago
summary: The sequel series to "Kinnikuman ii sei".     A new threat appears to defeat the Legends, known only as the 'Time Chojin'. These mysterious villains travel through time, in their quest to eradicate the Justice Chojin. If their plan succeeds, they will erase the New Generation from history and usher in a new era of evil domination over the humans.     The New Generation must travel through time to stop the Time Chojin.    In the process, they earn the distrust of the Legends. The ensuing conflict triggers the start of the 'Ultimate Chojin Tag Tournament', which will pit Legends against New Generation, and Justice Chojin vs Evil Chojin. The winners will determine the future of the planet as we know it and reign supreme over Earth.

name: Koi to Yobu ni wa Sasayaka desuga
creator: Hagiwara Daisuke
summary:
High school girl Sayama Umi is placed in the care of the neighboring Hiroi family while her mother is away on a long business trip. The Hiroi household is home to Shoya, an eight-years-older figure she admires, and Umi's heart races at their long-awaited reunion. But the Shoya she encounters is completely different from the one in her memories...

A faintly sparkling cohabitation story about meeting changed memories once more.

name: Konjiki no Word Master - Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat
creator: Tomoto Sui
summary:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.

name: Kono Class ni Gal wa Inai
creator: Tokita Shigure
summary: Mirei, a diligent honor student, longs for the flashy, fashionable "gyaru" lifestyle she admires in manga. With newfound courage, she decides to give herself a makeover and reinvent her image upon entering high school. There, she meets Yushin, a rough-around-the-edges boy, and... they hit it off?!

name: Koori no Jouheki (Book Version)
creator: Agasawa Koucha
summary:
Inept at dealing with people, Hikawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?! The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!
___
**Additional Links:**
- **Alt Official Raw:** [Shounen Jump+](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/14079602755350023318)
- [Official X](https://x.com/ramparts_ice)
- [Official Anime Site](https://korinojoheki-pr.com/)

name: Kotowarenai Kaichou wa Tomoe-kun ni Dake shite Agetai
creator: Numachi Doromaru
summary: The student council president, who is big in all sorts of ways, can't refuse when asked to do something. She tries her best to do whatever it takes to help the students, so Vice President Tomoe-kun stops her from going too far. But all she wants is to be asked for a naughty request from Tomoe-kun...

name: Koyoi, Lorenzi-ke de Kanbi naru Chuusei wo
creator: Fukami Aki
summary:
Rita, a girl with the legendary "Golden Eye," was caught by a human trafficker and put up for auction in the black market. It was the mafia boss, Albert Lorenzi, who won the auction, taking home Rita who lost her voice and was in despair due to past trauma.  
  
Rita follows his sweet whisper, "You'll be my bride," but discovers the ruthless side of him who points a gun at people with a smile on his face!  
  
What kind of fate is awaiting Rita who’s greeted by a dangerous mafioso?!

name: Kurai Anoko to Shitai Koto
creator: Ikari Manatsu
summary: Starting his second year of high school, Ren Tabata was determined to get over his loner past and make some new friends. The first person he approached was the girl next to him, Toruko Sasaki, who seemed gloomy and a little intimidating at first, but he couldn't seem to take his eyes off her. A romantic comedy between two shy but cute people who don't want to be alone anymore!

name: Li'l Miss Vampire Can't Suck Right
creator: Nishiki Kyosuke
summary: The overwhelming preciousness that captivates all those whose blood she sucks!

name: Life of Pyonko
creator: NeitheYAGI
summary:
A collection of the Pyonko and Friends mini-stories taken from the Author's X (Formerly Twitter) and Patreon accounts.

Uploaded out of chronological order.

name: Love Roma
creator: Toyoda Minoru
summary:
A story of love at first sight - literally. When Hoshino sees Negishi for the first time, he asks her to be his girlfriend. Shocked, Negishi nevertheless agrees to allow to Hoshino to walk her home, where he explains why he is in love with her. Touched, Negishi begins to feel something for this strange young boy from her school.
___
**Buy The Original Koudansha Version:**
- Amazon: [All 5](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B002DE6IW0), [1](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4063143309), [2](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4063143465), [3](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4063143546), [4](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4063143759), [5](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/406314397X)

name: Lu Bu's Life Simulator
creator: Yuewen Manhua (阅文漫画)
summary: “Take the prettiest women, ride the fastest war horse, wield the strongest weapon, one rider blocking the GuanDong 18 roads*. One man standing against ten thousand, they bow to this hero of turbulent times. People say if Lu Bu doesn’t die, there will be no opportunity to cause chaos. I laugh at all the hypocrites in the world; there are no other heroes besides Feng Xian. Entering the life story of more than a thousand reincarnations, experiencing the many vicissitudes of life, tempered into steel. Can the current Lu Bu Feng Xian withstand the inevitable end at Bai Men Lou?”

name: Líkāi Nǐ Yǐhòu
creator: 阿竹
summary: Xu Lingxin lost his eyesight because of an accident. However, his partner of seven years, Lu Tianqi, didn't seem to care at all. "Let's break up, then." After leaving Lu Tianqi and finding his way through living alone in the dark, Xu Lingxin thought he was already used to being by himself. So why does Lu Tianqi seem unwilling to let go, as if trying to get him back? Meanwhile, his physician, Dr. Qin, wants to take this chance to get closer... With strong contenders on both sides, what will Xu Lingxin do?

name: MAD
creator: Ootori Yuusuke
summary: Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John, his sister, and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit… But one day, they're targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Invasion-hen
creator: Satou Tsutomu
summary:
The Parasites Invade Again!

The year is 2097. After being attacked by a parasite, Lina escapes from the United States of North America and returns to Japan to join Tatsuya and Miyuki. Meanwhile, Kudou Minoru, who has been infested by a parasite, attacks the hospital to take Minami away.

Adaptation from the original novel volume 26.

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Raihousha-hen
creator: Satou Tsutomu
summary:
Miyuki's classmate Kitayama Shizuku is on her way to study abroad.  
For magicians, this is normally impossible, since allowing the genes of someone who can use magic outside their home country's borders is tantamount to giving up national secrets.  
But it's allowed to happen in one case-exchange programs. And that's how Angelina has arrived in Japan from the USNA to study at First High. But it seems she's a part of something much bigger than a simple cultural exchange!  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 9-11.

name: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken ni Tsuite
creator: Pentagon
summary: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Emma, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!

name: Make Heroine o Katasetai!!
creator: Nakayama Michiru
summary:
Manaka Kawashima, a high school girl, is in love with her childhood friend and classmate, Ei Eguchi. She continues to think of him with single-minded devotion… until another heroine, Ayame Takabi, suddenly transfers into their class.

Unlike Kawashima, however, Takabi is a natural-born winning heroine: on the very morning of her transfer, she bumps into Ei-kun on the way to school, gets a lucky perv moment, and basically hits every classic rom-com flag right out of the gate.

Kawashima falls into despair... but then the story’s background character MC, Kimura, decides he’s going to fight to guide her from being a losing heroine to a winning heroine…!?

name: Make a Girl
creator: Yasuda Genshou
summary:
Taking place in the near future, Mizutamari Akira, a brilliant young scientist who developed Salt, a robot that assists people in their daily lives, finds himself at a dead end after a series of failed inventions. When a friend suggests he could "power up" his personal life by creating a girlfriend. He develops an artificial partner, "No. 0," who quite literally becomes his girlfriend. Torn between her programmed emotions and her own evolving feelings, No. 0 faces an emotional conflict. Will love blossom between her and Akira, who is unused to connecting with others, or...?

(Source: MU)

name: Meitantei Conan vs. Kuro-zukume no Otokotachi
creator: Gosho Aoyama
summary: A Collection Of Cases When Conan Fight The Black Organization.

name: Metcha Shoukan Sareta Ken
creator: Saitousa
summary:
It was another boring school day, or so thought Inori Takafuji until Goddess summons him and his classmates to a different world. 

Just as Inori gets excited for a new life, he is banished and resummoned to other worlds over and over again, each time with new, additional powers! 

Will there be an actual challenge and suspense befitting our super-packed hero or will the adventure be a breeze?

name: Minami no Teiou
creator: Tennouji Dai
summary: Centers around Ginjirou Manda, a loan shark who charges toichi — 10% more interest every 10 days, or 365% every year. Thanks to his unrelenting money-collecting tactics, he is feared as "Minami no Oni" or the "Demon" of Osaka's Minami business district.

name: Minami-ke
creator: Sakuraba Coharu
summary:
*Minami-ke* ("The Minami Household") is a manga following the three Minami sisters, Haruka, Kana, and Chiaki in their lives at home and school. It's a funny manga that depicts how these characters interact with each other and their classmates. Although they are ordinary girls, their ordinary adventures are told in an extraordinary manner.
**Source:** MangaUpdates

name: Mini 4WD Fighter V
creator: Aoki Takao
summary: Mini 4WD Fighter, the iconic superhero of the Mini 4WD hobby! He loves the hobby just as much as the kids and shows his enthusiasm though his commentary through tournaments while cheering the racers in fair play.

name: Minigram (MILGRAM 4koma)
creator: Yamanaka Takuya
summary: The day-to-day lives of the prisoners and guards of the Milgram Prison! But in a funny 4-Koma form!

name: Moon Slayer
creator: Col
summary: After becoming a boss in the game, I began hiding within the players whilst uncovering the secrets of the game world. In order to become the only king, I have decided to resort to every conceivable means to change this world. Guilds? Players? Bosses? They are all stepping stones to achieve my goal. I will be slaying everything “Illusory Moon” has brought upon the world.

name: Mujikbaeksu Gye Baek-sun
creator: Zirarval
summary: With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?

name: My Favorite Savior Girl
creator: Sosoman (소소만)
summary: [Translated by Mystic Willow Scans] As Lee Yeo-ju hums a song that comforted her during her long hospital stay, she is approached by an idol star named Park Jae-ha, whom she has only seen in videos. "I'll help you. You need money for the surgery, right?" Jae-ha becomes Yeo-ju's savior and favorite. However, five years later, he ends his life by making an extreme choice... Yeo-ju, in shock, cries out to a shooting star to save him. Did her wish come true? She goes back seven years and possesses the body of Jang Bo-ran, a top idol at the time and a judge on the audition program "I Am the Strongest Idol"... Among the audition participants is trainee Park Jae-ha!"Just like you saved me, I will save you this time."

name: My Name Is Shingo
creator: Kazuo Umezu
summary:
Two elementary school pupils, a girl named Marine and a boy named Satoru, fall in love and are blessed with a rather unorthodox child which happens to be a robot. This robot is called Shingo and the story recounts how its mind develops and how it travels the world in pursuit of its ‘parents’ whom it has never had a chance to meet.

Note: Volume count based on the bunkoban.

name: My Villain Gang
creator: Demongem
summary:
When the path of the super hero changes, just one bad day can create the ultimate villain.

(Source: Pixiv)

name: Märchen Crown
creator: Aoi Kujira
summary: Rapunzel is a young girl who lives atop a tall tower and knows nothing of the outside world. One day she meets a boy named Mikel, who climbs the tower, and their destiny to change the world begins to unfold!

name: Nabe ni Dangan o Ukenagara
creator: Aoki Juntarou
summary: Meet Juntaro. A Japanese fishing addict who was born and raised in what is perceived to be one of the roughest parts of Japan. It is through his lens where you can experience various parts of the world, their culture, and of course their food. He particularly loves to visit countries and cities that are also believed to be highly dangerous due to his personal belief that they will absolutely have delicious food. Because this was intended for a Japanese audience, you will also get to witness various worldviews unique to Japan alongside it all. There's just one problem: He has extreme brainrot and views the world through a cute anime girl filter.

name: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
creator: Egaki Numa
summary: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!

name: Nani mo Wakaranai
creator: 7Liquid
summary: What if you lost all your memories and were suddenly thrown into an unfamiliar world? And what if you couldn't understand a word the other person said……? In this new world, with this unknown girl. A survival communication story in a different world, starting from zero knowledge, begins!

name: Nee, Mou Isso Tsukiacchau? Osananajimi no Bishoujo ni Tanomarete, Camo Kareshi Hajimemashita
creator: Kanoda Kizu
summary:
Masaichi Mazono, an otaku boy, and Toiro Kurumi, the most beautiful girl in school, are childhood friends. Toiro, who was always in Masaichi's room, was supposed to be like family to him. But one day, Toiro, who was constantly getting annoyed by her romantic troubles, asks Masaichi to play the role of her boyfriend. They thought it would be simple to pretend to be a couple because they’d been together for so long, but their ideal childhood friend can't possibly end up as a false lover...

_"E-eh no, holding hands is embarrassing."_

A childhood friend who is more than a lover embarks on a more adventurous lover's life than she could have dreamed!

name: Neoeui Wandukongeur Moggo Sipeo!
creator: 니소라스
summary:
Ordinary high school girl Ok Su-Yeon has a complex about her hair sticking up on her head. One day, a new transfer student comes...

"He's half-soybean?! But what? I'm a vegetable too?!"

name: Nozomanu Fushi no Boukensha
creator: Okano Yuu
summary: It's been ten years since Rentt Faina, a down-on-his luck Bronze-class adventurer, set his eyes on becoming Mithril-class. Unfortunately, Rentt finds himself helpless when confronted by a legendary Dragon in the Labyrinth of the Moon's Reflection... and is summarily eaten. But Rentt has miraculously reawakened... as a skeleton?

name: Nyoro Nyoro
creator: Koonita Birako
summary:
A slightly bizarre, and crazy fantasy world!?

Nyororin, a girl with a snake-like body, lives with her otherworldly father, snake mother, and snake-like younger brother.

Her daily life with her slightly strange friends is eccentric and unpredictable!?

A slightly dark, and slightly gentle, new sensational manga!

name: Ochaocha ~Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto~
creator: Giba-chan
summary:
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/gibagibagiba/status/1633031267829817344) (Chapter 2),
[Nico Nico Douga Manga](https://sp.manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63088) (Different chapter numbering)
- Defunct Official Raw (Chapter 1) - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/105860251), [FANBOX](https://gibagibagiba.fanbox.cc/posts/5412957)

name: Oda Nobunaga ni Hyouisareta Akuyaku Reijou wa Tenka Touitsu Shitakunai!
creator: Yotsuba Yuuto
summary: Risha, an extremely shy young woman, is falsely accused of injuring Tokia, a countess, at a party one day. However, this was a trap by Tokia to gain control of her family's land. Risha is framed as a villainous daughter, and as punishment for injuring Tokia, she is placed under house arrest in a stable. While she is burned by Tokia's friends and has no way to escape, Nobunaga Oda comes to possess her. The birth of a great impudent young lady!

name: Okaasan Boukensha, Login Bonus de Skill [Shufu] ni Mezamemashita. Shuuichi Moraeru Chirashi de Boukensha Seikatsu Ganbarimasu!
creator: Yuuko
summary:
Kachua, a mother of two, works part-time as a porter carrying supplies for adventurers while raising her children. She struggles daily to balance parenting and work, but one day she receives a skill from the goddess—and begins her life as a true adventurer! And her weapons? A ladle and a pot lid!? The newbie mom adventurer begins her laid-back, unstoppable journey! A relaxed and fun adventure tale begins!!
___
**Character Designer:** [Kyouichi](https://mangadex.org/author/08774bec-47fb-4ca4-aefb-ef6a2c2201c6)

name: One Punch-Man
creator: ONE
summary:
After rigorously training for three years, the ordinary Saitama has gained immense strength which allows him to take out anyone and anything with just one punch. He decides to put his new skill to good use by becoming a hero. However, he quickly becomes bored with easily defeating monsters, and wants someone to give him a challenge to bring back the spark of being a hero.  
  
Upon bearing witness to Saitama's amazing power, Genos, a cyborg, is determined to become Saitama's apprentice. During this time, Saitama realizes he is neither getting the recognition that he deserves nor known by the people due to him not being a part of the Hero Association. Wanting to boost his reputation, Saitama decides to have Genos register with him, in exchange for taking him in as a pupil. Together, the two begin working their way up toward becoming true heroes, hoping to find strong enemies and earn respect in the process.  
  



---

**Notes:**  
- Because some groups use the web version of the manga while others use the magazine version, the numbering won't match between different languages.  
- **Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of One Punch Man are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/one-punch-man) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US).**

name: One Room, Hiatari Futsuu, Tenshi-tsuki.
creator: matoba
summary:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven??? Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity?
___
**NOTE:** The Omake chapters at the end of each volume are usually "prequel", not directly happened after the last chapter of said volume. Please refer to the Table of Content or the chapter number itself for details.

name: Ookii Muki Muki Chiisai Muchi Muchi
creator: Hinohara Fuki
summary: Every day, the muscular young man Kataoka dedicates himself to building his muscles. At his regular gym, there's one staff member he can't take his eyes off. Her name? Shiina. But what caught his attention wasn't her curves... it was her plump, round belly!?

name: Ore no Class ni Wakagaetta Moto Yome ga Iru
creator: Nekomata Nuko
summary: On the way home after filing for divorce, Kohei Kurose is hit by a car and is transported back in time to his high school days! Determined to enjoy his new life, he heads back to his high school, only to find his ex-wife, Yuzuka, there...?

name: Osake to Senpai Kanojo to no Amaama Doukyo Lovecome wa Nijuusai ni Natte kara
creator: Kobaya J
summary:
Living together with a naughty older girlfriend is full of excitement!

“Shall we try living together?”

That was the question my girlfriend Kureha Senpai asked me on the day I turned twenty.

From there, our lovey-dovey cohabitation began, and there’s practically zero distance between us!

Kureha Senpai, who loves alcohol, becomes even more enchanting and seductive once she starts drinking… my reasoning is about to explode!

The two of us, deeply caring for each other, grow bolder in our affection whether we’re drinking at home or out, using every trick in the book to flirt and get closer!

A slightly naughty and pure love comedy about two people who can’t contain their love for each other, living out their exciting days!
___
**Character Designer:** [Monoto](https://mangadex.org/author/96b3bbe2-e878-4dee-9573-26aadbc78b3f)

name: Osananajimi to wa Romcom ni Naranai
creator: Misu Shinya
summary: The high school boy Eiyuu has a problem! His two childhood friends (♀) who go to the same school as him, Shio and Akari, are too cute! Even though they have no interest in him, he looks at their grown-up selves with sexual interest. If they were to find out... it would be utterly embarrassing! Meanwhile, his two childhood friends also have secrets of their own...!? It's irritating! It's complicated!! But childhood friends are the best!!!

name: Osananananajimi
creator: Yukimori Nene
summary:
Momose Yuuichi and Fujino Sumi are childhood friends who have been together since they were little. Now, they're high school classmates, but since they've reached puberty, they don't feel as close as they used to.  They know each other well, but there's a sense of formality there.  This is the delicate relationship between them, until one day, Sumi suddenly comes to Yuuichi's house…?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Tonari no Young Jump](https://tonarinoyj.jp/episode/2550912965910028107)

name: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsunomanika Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken
creator: Saeki-san
summary: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an "angel." Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she's also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm.

name: Ouji-sama no Tomodachi
creator: Sukeroku
summary:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!

name: Ouran High School Host Club
creator: Hatori Bisco
summary: One day, Haruhi, a scholarship student at exclusive Ouran High School, breaks an $80,000 vase that belongs to the "Host Club," a mysterious campus group consisting of six super-rich (and gorgeous) guys. To pay back the damages, she is forced to work for the club, and it's there that she discovers just how wealthy the boys are and how different they are from everybody else. [Viz]

name: Outen no Mon
creator: Haibara Yaku (灰原薬)
summary:
Heian period Japan. The Fujiwara family is plotting to seize power at the court, when two maids suddenly go missing from the capital. The emperor fears that it is the work of a demon, and orders Ariwara no Narihira to work with a young man. The boy's name is Sugawara no Michizane.   
Sugawara no Michizane, a shut-in student, and Ariwara no Narihira, a Kyoto playboy, are twenty years apart in age. They are different in status and birth, yet work together to solve the mysteries of Kyoto!

name: Planetary Human II: Globe
creator: Jo Seok (조석)
summary: The second season of Cho Seok's Tidal Universe masterpiece, Planetary Human. So… prepare yourself to be mindfucked.

name: Please Bully Me, Miss Villainess!
creator: Chise
summary: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!

name: Powpow Odyssey
creator: Ai Mogami
summary:
A parody of modern shounen

A young rabbit man and his two dipshit friends try to solve the murder of one of their fathers.

Soundtrack to listen to while reading: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL352CWaMNzHM9hdwHsXKaAQZRtqRkkSTH

name: Primal Hunter
creator: Zogarth
summary: Jake, a seemingly average office worker, unexpectedly finds himself thrust into a fantasy world teeming with dangers and opportunities. Rather than succumbing to fear, Jake thrives in this unfamiliar realm. As he navigates the expansive multiverse, his power grows and he transforms—evolving from a mundane office worker into a true apex hunter.

name: Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku Comic Anthology
creator: Sachiko
summary:
Now, to the story of finding your true feelings...

The popular game "Project Sekai Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku"'s first comic anthology!

The world of 'Proseka' is expanding with this all-new comic book.

Each unit's daily life is presented in a large volume!

name: Puniru Is a Cute Slime
creator: Maeda-kun
summary:
The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!

Won the 70th Shougakukan Manga Award.

name: Quánzhí Fǎshī
creator: Chaos
summary:
Our hero, Mo Fan, inherits a magical necklace—the next day, he wakes up to find that the world has changed. His high school now teaches magic, and students are encouraged to try and become accomplished magicians. A world that ran on science now runs on magic. However, some things are still the same. He still has a teacher who sees him as a hopeless student, classmates who look the same, a father who struggles to make ends meet, and a not-by-blood little sister who can't walk on her own.
However, Mo Fan discovers that the vast majority of magicians can only harness one element of magic. As luck would have it, however, he is an exception—a versatile mage!

(Source: WebNovel)


---

name: Reijou Alice no Eiyuutan: Kizoku no Shoujo ni Tensei shita Eiyuu wa Yagate Saikyou to nari Hitobito wo Sukuu tame Musou suru
creator: Kaedehara Kouta
summary: Once hailed as a hero, his life was cut short by a blade... Only to be reborn as a feeble young girl! Although overprotected by his maid, Sakuna, he will rise again to save those in need!

name: Rejoice in Your Enemies
creator: Shou
summary: His beloved crush was snatched up by the nerdy new student.  Furious, Ren Zhichu tries to harass that nerd at every chance he gets. Unexpectedly, during their interactions with each other, Ren Zhichu actually develops feelings for that nerd...

name: SHWD
creator: sono.N
summary: Manga serialization of the doujinshi work with the same name.

name: Saijaku Kizoku ni Tensei Shita no de Akuyakutachi wo Atsumete Mita
creator: Sorano Susumu
summary: "The Weakest Noble, Adele: Turning Villains into Allies for Territory Management!" Adele, a noble with the weakest standing, faces an unavoidable downfall if he doesn’t act fast. Determined to escape ruin, he decides to do the unthinkable: recruit the most powerful villains as his allies! Together with his unlikely companions, Adele embarks on a journey to transform his neglected territory into a prosperous domain. Can this underdog noble rise above his circumstances and rewrite his destiny with the help of his fearsome new friends?

name: Saikin, Uchi no Robot no Yousu ga Okashii
creator: Ouchi Kaeru (御家かえる)

name: Samishin Botchi na Kuroneko Ω wa Dekai Konkon Sosogarechu
creator: Abuku

name: Scallion and coriander without chilli
creator: Xiao wu
summary: Mama's male cat Coriander, the socially anxious princess cat, Scallion, and cunning Chili's daily life.

name: School Bus Graveyard
creator: Lilredbeany
summary: Ashlyn is a loner in high school with no friends. But when a fateful visit to a haunted house causes her and her classmates to see monsters at night, she'll be forced to forge bonds to survive.

name: Seiin no Otome: Moto Yakugaku Kenkyuuin datta Koushaku Reijou wa Kon'yaku Jitai Shite High Healer o Mezashimasu
creator: Fujiwara Leica

name: Seirei-tachi no Rakuen to Risou no Isekai Seikatsu
creator: Tamutamu
summary: It's the Golden Week, and Morizono Yuuta can't wait to spend the next 11 days staying home and conquering all of his games and manga. After a trip to the supermarket to stock up on food however, he found himself stranded in a wasteland with no sight of human. Now he's just gonna have to find a way to live in this world aided only by some magic tools and numerous Spirits whom he came into contact with.

name: Sekai de Ichiban "Kawaii" Amamiya-san, Nibanme wa Ore.
creator: Aminohada
summary: Hikari, a highly popular model hailed as the "Cutest Girl in the World"... The mysterious model turned out to be an ordinary high school student named Harema Kouki! Kouki is troubled by the fact that he feels he's too cute when cross-dressing and can't find other girls cute... But by a twist of fate, he realizes that his classmate, Amamiya-san, is much cuter than him—!?

name: Sekigan, Sekiwan, Sekkyaku no Majutsushi ~Mori no Koya ni Komotteitara Haya 2000-nen. Kizukeba Majin to Yobareteita. Boku wa Tada Majutsu no Tankyuu o Shitai Dake na no ni~
creator: Suzusuke
summary:
The Autonomous City of Ains Territory prospers through highly advanced sorcery and magic. The one who once shattered its peace was a young man with a beautiful yet bizarre appearance, having only one eye, one arm, and one leg. It was none other than the legendary sorcerer Eins Silvetas, who built the foundation for everything two thousand years ago!
While he was holed up in his forest cabin, time continued to flow. When he hit a dead end in his research and finally stepped outside, he discovered that his "scribbled notes" were now treated as a holy bible known as the "Grimoire", and he was being worshipped as a "Demon God".
Unaware of his status, he sets out on a journey to explore sorcery, simply following his own curiosity.
Touching upon the laws of the world, he unknowingly shatters the balance between nations! An authentic fantasy about a carefree, strongest Demon God!

name: Sekitou Elegy
creator: Kira Takashi
summary: Satoshi Yanagawa is working part-time controlling traffic at work sites, and works with a beautiful girl that he likes at first sight. But she has a pretty bad character. Are there any prospects for romance? Read on to find out, the story is hilarious at certain moments, and touching at others.

name: Senki Kanshoku Symphogear ~Shirabemeshi~
creator: Kaneko Akifumi
summary: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.

name: Seres's Resolve: The Battle for Humanity
creator: Snap Studio (三原社)
summary: I'll never stop fighting tooth and nail to safeguard humanity and all people under heaven. It's time to power up the system once more, ramping up its capabilities to meet this crucial challenge!

name: Sewayaki Kitsune no Senko-san
creator: Rimukoro
summary:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.

name: Shachou to Sake to Hoshi
creator: Zurikishi
summary: After the sudden death of her father, 24-year-old Reina Izutsu finds herself at the helm of the family business, Izutsu Printing. Thrust into the role of company president, the pressure quickly hardens her demeanor—leaving her employees walking on eggshells, especially Kenichi Ishizumi, the stoic 37-year-old senior supervisor. One night, overwhelmed and tipsy in a quiet park, Reina blurts out, "That's it! I quit being everyone's boss!"—completely unaware that the man beside her is her employee. Under the soft glow of the stars, he listens silently... and makes a quiet vow to stand by her side.

name: Shibou Yuugi de Meshi wo Kuu.
creator: Yuuji Ukai
summary:
Player Name: Yuki
Age: 17
Profession: Death Games

A huge amount of money, with lives on the line.
Participants? Beautiful girls only.

A deadly showbiz where people die.
These death games are her calling and her reason to live.

For some reason she knows: This is where she belongs.
Elegant. Ruthless.

Cutting through the dazzling gauntlet of death.
Playfully. Desperately.

Aiming for the unprecedented "99 Consecutive Wins"!

name: Shimeji Simulation
creator: Tsukumizu
summary:
A surreal yet heartwarming 4-koma series about everyday life.  
  
From the author of Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou/Girls' Last Tour.

name: Shin Kirari
creator: Yamada Murasaki
summary:
A celebrated masterwork shimmering with vulnerability from one of alt-manga's most important female artists.

"Now that we've woken from the dream, what are we going to do?" Chiharu thinks to herself, rubbing her husband's head affectionately.

Set in an apartment complex on the outskirts of Tokyo, Murasaki Yamada's Talk to My Back (1981-84) explores the fraying of Japan's suburban middle-class dreams through a woman's relationship with her two daughters as they mature and assert their independence, and with her husband, who works late and sees his wife as little more than a domestic servant.

(Source: Drawn & Quarterly)

name: Shio no Kikan ~Moto Yuusha no Ore, Jibun ga Soshiki Shita Chuunibyou Himitsu Kessha wo Tomeru Tame ni Futatabi Isekai ni Shoukan Sarete Shimau~
creator: Sty
summary:
"How can my past self get so excited doing all those embarrassing things?!"

When he was in the third year of middle school, Hizaki Shiou was summoned to another world to save it. After defeating the Demon King, he was forcibly returned back to the present day. Yet another three years later, he is summoned to the other world once again, this time to stop the rampage of the secret society "Helheim."

That organization was supposedly actually the one that he had founded during his *chuunibyou* phase, where he called himself the "Corpse King"—a dark past too embarrassing to remember!

Someone seems to be impersonating the name of "Helheim" and tarnishing its reputation. To uncover the truth behind this mystery and clear the organization's name, the Corpse King reunites with his former subordinates, the "Hakkai," who once made Helheim the strongest it had ever been. While agonizing over his dark past, he begins to take action in the other world once again.

Their first stop is the Steel City of Gagiul—rescue the city struggling through famine as well as the pale-looking count's daughter in distress.

"Helheim, moving out."

name: Shota Oni
creator: Nakayama Miyuki
summary: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.

name: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi: Futari no Jikan, Iiwake no 5000-en
creator: Haneda Usa
summary: Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai's time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi's orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school... Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.

name: Solo Leveling
creator: Chugong
summary: In a world of hunters and gates, the weakest hunter rises...

name: Special Civil Servant
creator: Kwon Sora (권소라)
summary: Socially-awkward Maru Han bombs his fifth attempt at getting a dream job in the civil service. But after a strange creature attacks him in the mountains, he finds himself recruited into the Special Civil Service for the Ministry of Environment. This secret organization is dedicated to fighting nachal, human-devouring demons who appear in clouds of yellow dust. As Maru struggles in his new job fighting nachal, he must find out why they're mysteriously drawn to him before the prophesied end of the world arrives.

name: Surrendering To My Enemy's Cold Embrace
creator: Bai San Culture (白三文化)
summary: In a modern society populated by beastmen, the down-and-out actress, Shen Youqing, happens to be a chinchilla. During an audition, she was nearly sexually exploited by the assistant director. However,  just in the nick of time she was saved by someone she hadn’t seen in years: Shi Ruolin; her first love, marriage partner, fiancée, and mortal enemy whom she had not seen for many years. However, Shen Youqing didn’t even have time to thank her savior, and instead took the opportunity to escape. When meeting again, Shi Ruolin unexpectedly proposes a contract. Facing a financial crisis, Shen Youqing gives in to the temptation of making money and agrees to endure humiliation and become a subordinate of the cold-blooded snake. As they spend time together day and night, the long-standing misunderstandings between them slowly resolve, and their feelings for each other deepen as they spend the rest of their lives together.

name: Taida na Akujoku Kizoku ni Tensei Shita Ore, Scenario wo Bukkowa Shitara Kikaku-gai no Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta
creator: Kikuchi Kousei
summary:
