I don’t know how it happened, but somehow I’ve died and reincarnated into my favorite academy game. And if that wasn’t weird enough, I’m now the depraved and lazy villain, Weiss Fansent, whose misdeeds lead him to a deadly end - something I’m determined to avoid at all costs. 

With little time left until the academy’s entrance exams, I have no choice but to dive headfirst into serious and grueling training. Which means swordsmanship with the S-rank adventurer Miruku Abitas, followed by intense magic practice. It was demanding and exhausting, but getting stronger means I have a better chance of avoiding my disastrous end. 

But I seriously underestimated just how powerful Weiss truly is, and I wind up stunning everyone at the exams! Have I somehow become more powerful than the hero?

___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69646)

name: Taika no Risei
creator: Itagaki Paru
summary: As birth rates decline, in an effort to increase the total population of Japan, the country has implemented... a pet-humanism policy...? As more and more owners "humanize" their pets--having them become members of society--Japan begins to experience a hike in economic growth, as well as in increase in crimes committed by these "dogmen" and "catmen"... In the midst of such social unrest, what could possibly be of bigger concern to one cynical high school girl named Ao...?

name: Taishu Shokudo Akuyaku Reijo Konyaku Hakisareta Node Shokudo o Hiraitara Yashinoryoku Ga Kaikashimashita
creator: Tsukahara Miyako

name: Takou no Koori Hime o Tasuketara, Otomodachi kara Hajimeru Koto ni Narimashita
creator: Satsuki Hiryuu
summary: Nagi Shinonome, known as the "Ice Princess," is a beautiful girl with a cold attitude who does not allow others to get close to her. One day, Souta Minori, who saw her being molested on the train, saved her with all his courage, but the next day she appeared again and said, "I want you to stay by my side." Can Souta continue as friends with the Ice Princess, who only sweetly melts for one person in the world, that is, himself?

name: Teisou Gyakuten Sekai Nara Moteru to Omotte Itara
creator: Hinami Yui
summary:
"A World Where Chastity is Reversed"—A dream world where the male-to-female ratio is 1:20, women have stronger sexual desires, and precious men live a smooth life protected by their bodyguards.

Fifteen years have passed since Ikuto Ichise was reincarnated into this world, which should have been a guaranteed harem, but for some reason, he isn't popular. Ikuto laments that it must be because his bodyguards are all handsome men, and especially his childhood friend Rui Toosaka, who is particularly high-spec... but in reality, the bodyguards are beautiful girls disguised as men!

Completely unaware, Ikuto is overly close and unguarded, making every girl feel like they have a chance. As he unintentionally forms an oblivious harem, Rui, who wishes to be seen as a girl, reveals everything to him—!?

The curtain rises on a romantic comedy harem story where my demand is enormous, and it's always my peak popularity period!

name: Tenbou Daikaku
creator: Yuba Fumiji
summary:
Since ancient times, the arcane arts have been used as tools of political strife and weapons of war. Practitioners of these arts, known as spellcasters, sought to ensure the survival of their kind by demonstrating the utility of their powers to the government. However, as the ages passed and the number of spellcasters grew, momentum built within the arcane community to reassess their societal standing. It was in this climate that a nation of spellcasters—commonly known as the Eastern Enchantment—was born. And the governing body of this land came to be called... the Empyreal Cabinet.
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://x.com/tembodaikaku)

name: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Ibun - Makoku Kurashi no Trinity
creator: Fuse
summary:
This Spinoff Manga has content based starting from Volume 4 of the Light Novel.

Against the odds, the little slime Rimuru has established Tempest, his magical country for all monsters, and it’s thriving. Three visitors, Phos the fox girl, Stella the dragon girl, and Nemu the winged girl, come to pay Tempest a visit, and they’re stunned at just how quickly it’s developed.

name: The Blood of a Lover
creator: Artynoo
summary: When a bloodthirsty woman appears in the woods where Ivan and his witch sister Celine live, they plot to lure the vampire with Ivan's cursed blood to get rid of her before she causes them trouble. Will the plan succeed without the bait falling in love?

name: The Demon King's Beloved: Doting on the Abused Healing Maiden
creator: Machibari
summary:
Mei, the daughter of a family that exterminates vicious monsters, was raised in a cold environment, lacking the power to exorcise demons. Meanwhile, her arrogant younger brother violates a taboo and awakens Ryouga, the king of another world! Mei is left behind... Mei is in danger, but Ryouga is actually a gentle, intelligent, and handsome young man. He teaches her the value of the rare "healing power" she possesses, and invites her to "become my princess."

(Source: Comic Walker, translated)

name: The Idol and Her Egg Problem
creator: Glutamat
summary:
A rising winged idol hides a secret: every month, like clockwork, Amirare lays a single, shimmering egg. 

One day, just as Amirare tries to sneak away backstage in pain, she got caught in the act.

name: The Marshal King
creator: Boichi
summary:
Nobody on the continent hasn't heard of the evil deeds of the great outlaw M. Godspeed. But one day, a young man claiming to be the criminal's son suddenly appears trekking through the harsh desert. This Jim Godspeed says he's killed his father and has the corpse to prove it!

(Source: MangaPlus)

name: The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter
creator: Liaran (리아란)
summary:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)

name: The Ravages of Time
creator: Chen Mou
summary:
Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.  
  
Hong Kong artist Chan Mou retells this classic tale in "The Ravages of Time" from the perspective of the Sima clan, which in the end united the three kingdoms. Readers will be attracted by an array of well-developed characters and Chan Mou's own unique top-notch art-style. Whether you have played Dynasty Warriors or not, this is definitely worth a read!

name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse
creator: Suzuki Nakaba
summary: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey.

name: The Tale of JIRO
creator: Akira Sugita
summary:
Called “the greatest sushi in the world” and respected by chefs across the globe, Sukiyabashi Jiro’s master craftsman, Ono Jirō, continues to make sushi even at 93 years old (as of October 2018).
What kind of childhood did he have?
What kinds of hardships and training did he endure?
What has supported him throughout his life?
Where did his unwavering dedication come from?

Manga artist Akira Sugita, who spent over two years following Jirō closely, including traveling to his birthplace and training sites, depicts the life of this remarkable man.

This first, fully dedicated comic, collecting the four chapters that originally ran in Big Comic Original “Sushi Special Issue” in the summer of 2016, plus the additional story “JIRO ~ Silver of Integrity” is sure to fascinate chefs and readers around the world.

name: Tomehane!
creator: Kawai Katsutoshi
summary:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)

name: Toshokan no Tensai Shoujo: Honzuki no Shinjin Kanri wa Boudai na Chishiki de Kuni wo Sukuimasu
creator: Aoi Misa (蒼井美紗)
summary:
Martina loves books and has finally read every book in town, so she aims to become a government official in search of books from the undiscovered royal palace library. She takes on a highly challenging exam, but her incredible memory, never forgetting a single word of the book she reads, means she passes with a perfect score!? Assigned to the Political Affairs Department, Martina surprises those around her with her powerful memory, but one day, an unnatural monster appears...!?

(Source: ComicWalker, translated)

name: Toujima Tanzaburou wa Kamen Rider ni Naritai
creator: Ishinomori Shotaro
summary: Ever since he was born, Tanzaburo dreamed of becoming a Kamen Rider. Even as a 40 year old adult, he continued to dream about becoming one and he would train and exercise regularly. One day, "Shocker" appeared and attacked a convenience store to rob them. Springing to action, Tanzaburo put on a plastic Kamen Rider mask and faced the criminals. Instead of being seen as a hero, he was made into an internet laughing stock! Determined to end the fake Shocker's schemes by investigating, Tanzaburo takes to the streets as Kamen Rider!

name: Toukyou Ghoul:re
creator: Ishida Sui
summary:
Two years have passed since the CCG's raid on Anteiku. Although the atmosphere in Tokyo has changed drastically due to the increased influence of the CCG, ghouls continue to pose a problem as they have begun taking caution, especially the terrorist organization Aogiri Tree, who acknowledge the CCG's growing threat to their existence.  
  
The creation of a special team, known as the Quinx Squad, may provide the CCG with the push they need to exterminate Tokyo's unwanted residents. As humans who have undergone surgery in order to make use of the special abilities of ghouls, they participate in operations to eradicate the dangerous creatures. The leader of this group, Haise Sasaki, is a half-ghoul, half-human who has been trained by famed special class investigator, Kishou Arima. However, there's more to this young man than meets the eye, as unknown memories claw at his mind, slowly reminding him of the person he used to be.  


---

name: Trigun Maximum
creator: Nightow Yasuhiro
summary:
Vash the Stampede rises again! It's been two years since the mysterious and super-nice gunman went into hiding, and the people of his desert planet are suffering. It takes a friend in peril to bring him out, and when he does, his enemies come chasing… as well as those crazy insurance girls, Millie and Meryl. And Wolfwood the wandering priest? Well, that's who found him in the first place! The gang's all back, and the trouble is coming in Trigun Maximum.

Notes:
 - Nightow changed publishers to Shonen Gahosha and the series continued to be serialized in Young King Ours magazine. Due to the original publisher retaining the name Trigun, Nightow had to change the title to Trigun Maximum, which isn´t a sequel but a new name for the rest of the series. 
- The first 3 volumes were published under the title 'Trigun' and the entire series compiled into 14 books as 'Trigun Maximum' (the numbering was also restarted when the title changed).
 - Won the Seiun Award at the 48th Japan Science Fiction Conventionwere for the best comic of the year.

name: Uchi no Musuko wa Tabun Gay
creator: Okura
summary: A sweet, open-minded mother starts suspecting one of her sons might be gay.

name: Uma Musume - Pretty Derby: Star Blossom
creator: Monjūsaki
summary:
The popular cross-media content "Uma Musume Pretty Derby" features "Uma Musume" who have inherited the names and souls of numerous racehorses! A new legend begins with the indomitable horse girl "Sakura Laurel" as the main character.
___
- [Alternative Raw](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/4856001361118480104)

name: Watashi wo Suki Sugiru Yuusha-sama wo Riyou shite, Konse koso Nagaiki suru Tsumoridattanoni (Tabun, Mata Shippaishita)
creator: Kotoko (琴子)
summary:
Lisette, the daughter of an earl, is destined to be killed and eaten by a monster on her 20th birthday.
She is currently living her fourth life with all her memories intact.

In order to live longer this time, she goes to live in a sanctuary (the countryside) where monsters do not appear, but one day she reunites with Ralph, the handsome son of an aristocrat.

He is the young man whom Lisette saved when he was an orphan in her childhood.
The first words he says to her are, "I lived for you."

The first volume of a fantasy about a heroine who fights against her fate of death and a submissive, high-spec yandere hero, a devoted and doting love story!

name: Xuè Jī yǔ Qíshì
creator: SF Light Novels (SF轻小说)
summary:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

name: Yabai Idol no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi
creator: Kai Bashira
summary: Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side... On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!

name: Yama, Kaimashita ~Isekai Gurashi mo Warukunai~
creator: Jitsukawa Emu
summary:
When I bought a mountain, I never expected it to be from another world! And while I was leisurely enjoying a countryside life suited to this strange realm, I unknowingly began making the mountain more powerful!?

(Source: Amazon JP, edited)

name: Yancha Gal no Anjou-san
creator: Katou Yuuichi
summary:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal)

name: Yankee Akuyaku Reijou - Tensei Tenka Yuiga Dokuson
creator: Akashingou Wataru (赤信号わたる)
summary: Ryuji, the head of the legendary biker gang "Antoinette", is reincarnated in a different world after a motorcycle accident. As... a villainess!!! Ryuji is tangled in the troubles of the life of Elsa, the daughter of the Tsochuarch family, and is about to be executed?!

name: Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan
creator: Sogabe Toshinori
summary: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?

name: Yohane of the Parhelion - Unpolarized Reflexion
creator: Kimino Sakurako
summary: The story of the girl everyone knows, but no one knows the story of. The daily life of Yohane, who runs a fortune teller's shop in a town by the sea, is relaxed, heartwarming, sometimes full of black magic? A short comic depicting the days of an illusion, near and far.

name: You Shou Yan
creator: 靴下猫腰子
summary:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?

name: Youkai Gakkou no Sensei Hajimemashita!
creator: Tanaka Mai
summary: Haruaki is a scaredy-cat with a fetish for girls' school uniforms, but he also wants to be a good teacher. However, his new school isn’t exactly what he thought it would be: it's an academy for monsters, demons, ghosts and all sorts of supernatural creatures!

name: Yuumei VTuber no Ani Dakedo, Nazeka Ore ga Yuumei ni Natteita
creator: Ibarakino
summary: I have a stepsister named Isuzu. She is a super popular VTuber with over 1 million subscribers, "Isuzu Wine". One day, she forgot to turn off her stream, and our candid conversation was accidentally broadcasted worldwide! The clip of the streaming incident quickly went viral, and overnight, I became an internet sensation...!? The more accidents happen, the more popular she gets!! Together with my overly beautiful and clingy stepsister, and a cute senior VTuber, I aim to rise in the streaming industry!
